name: makemyreturns.com
tag_list: tax, efiling, income-tax, efiling-of-income-tax, finance, tax-returns
description: Online Tax Advisory and Filing Service
overview:
Online Income Tax Experts

MakeMyReturns.com is an online portal that provides professional services and guidance from experts to help in the electronic filing of Income Tax Returns in India.

MakeMyReturns.com is an online portal that offers various tailor made packages to customers who seek help on filing Tax Returns with the Income Tax Department of India. The company offers clients help on filing of tax returns through its taxation services. The portal also offers the advice of experts on various tax related matters.

The company aims at providing simple solutions that will make sense to the layman even if the tax problems itself are complex. The company claims to have the best brains at work for it, including experts in Income Tax, Sales Tax, Service Tax, and the best advisors for Corporate and Individual Finance, and of course Chartered Accountants. Together, this panel of experts aims to provide solutions which will be explained to customers in simple terms, at the same time ensuring that every complex tax solution has been worked out by the experts themselves.

MakeMyReturns.com is a mix of the online world and the taxation world. The company aims to provide tax solutions to its online clientele without them having to be physically present in front of the tax consultant during the process. The company offers various packages that help clients complete the electronic filing or the E-filing process of filing income tax returns in India. This process too is claimed to have been mastered by the company, thus enabling them to offer a simplified solution that offers ease and speed to customers with minimal efforts on their part.

There are three packages on offer and the portal has also laid down the charges for each. The packages currently offered on the portal are: The ‘Do It Yourself Package’ (Rs. 250 plus taxes) The ‘Expert Help Package’ (Rs. 1250 plus taxes) The ‘Global Indians Package’ (Rs. 2500 plus taxes) In addition to these packages, the company also offers exclusive tax advice to its customers through its panel of tax experts and financial advisors.

The privacy policy of the company is mentioned clearly where it assures its clientele that all the financial information disclosed by the client to the tax expert as well as MakeMyReturns.com will be kept confidential.

The company also informs customers that every service offered by it is through qualified and experienced tax professionals. The names of the well known tax consultancy firms of J. Ramchand & Company and M.B Advani & Company feature on the list of the panel that is behind MakeMyReturns.com. So do the names of individual financial experts such as Vikram Ramchand, Aashish Ramchand, and Varun Advani.
